title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds which makes them stand out much worse.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page have automatic borders, which identify them as user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out more.
